courseDescription:
Are you part of your company's senior management looking to analyse its current portfolio of products and services? This online course on strategic business management is just for you. We will introduce you to designing the best possible goals, objectives and strategies for any organisation. We will discuss corporate governance requirements, analyse the industry trends and devise the best possible approach that fits your organisational goals.

Are you wondering how Nike and Apple successfully create such a huge brand image? First, you will discover brand building and development and how constant evaluation of factors within and outside the organisation is crucial for organisational development. Next, you will learn to constantly identify key organisation techniques to capitalise on their strengths and opportunities. Finally, developing a solid customer bond shall also be discussed, which is paramount to success.

Are you wondering what corporate social responsibility is all about? We examine the ever-increasing trend of organisations trying to impact society in a positive manner. Then we research the essential tips and techniques you can use to improve any business. Whether it's strategy formulation or keeping a healthy relationship with relevant stakeholders, this online course on strategic business management covers all these aspects and much more. So don't waste any more time and take your learning journey forward.
